Title: Corrigendum to 'Life cycle assessment of biomass densification systems' [Biomass Bioenergy 107 (2017) 384–397] (Biomass and Bioenergy (2017) 107 (384–397), (S0961953417303422), (10.1016/j.biombioe.2017.10.026))
Abstract: © 2019 Elsevier LtdThe authors regret < The error in the abstract of the published article; the lower range for the GHG emissions as mass of CO2eq, is 0.6 g MJ-1 and not 600 t MJ-1 >. The authors would like to apologise for any inconvenience caused.
SubjectAreas: Renewable Energy, Sustainability and the Environment
